ceo_target_bonus_pct_of_salary_source: the Group Chief Executive Officer’s target is set at 100% of AFS
ceo_max_bonus_pct_of_salary_source: a maximum pay-out of 150% in case of overachievement
shareholding_requirement_ceo_source: the Group Chief Executive Officer will keep a number of Euronext shares representing an amount equivalent to 2 times his Annual Fixed Salary
extraction_notes: Currency set to EUR based on multiple euro-denominated figures. CEO salary increase computed from AFS unchanged at €1,000,000 in 2023 and 2024, yielding 0%. CEO STI target and max explicitly stated as 100% and 150% of AFS. CEO shareholding requirement explicitly 2x AFS. No explicit dilution metrics, workforce salary increase, clawback/malus, or post-cessation holding period found. LTI grant for CEO is 150% of AFS but a maximum as % of salary is not explicitly stated; performance multipliers apply to shares, not clearly to salary percentage, so ceo_ltip_max_pct_of_salary left null. ESG metrics are present in STI (explicit 10% ESG weighting).
